lines: *it's the first day of spring quarter, and you just walked in to your new class*
Oh boy, CMPM 170. I really hope this class isn't too hard. I heard Altice-sensei is super harsh. W-woah!!
*You stumble to the ground, dropping all your books*
'I saw you take that fall pretty badly. What's your name?'
Protag? That's a funny name. I'm Frankenstein, but you can call me Frankie. Are you also in this class?
That's great! Maybe we can work on a, uhh, project together! What do you think?
options: Did you know that the CIA Killed JFK?

lines: Oh. Ok. See you around Protag-san...
Haha, you're so funny Protag-san! See you around!
